rules.name: CCEUpdateSuppression
rules.description: 通过将潜影盒命名为“更新抑制器”或“updateSuppression”来制作基于"ClassCastException"的更新抑制器

rules.name: bindingCurseInvalidation
rules.description: 玩家可以取下带有绑定诅咒的护甲

rules.name: blueIceCanSpawn
rules.description: 生物不能在蓝冰上生成

rules.name: canActivatesObserver
rules.description: 侦测器可以通过用打火石右键直接激活

rules.name: canMineSpawner
rules.description: 刷怪笼可以使用精准采集工具采集

rules.name: canParseWayPoint
rules.description: 通过移除路径点中的交互事件来让OMMC可以解析聊天中的路径点

rules.name: channelingIgnoreWeather
rules.description: 使用带引雷的三叉戟引雷时不考虑天气

rules.name: commandBlockFinder
rules.description: 启用/blockFinder命令用来在指定范围内查找指定方块
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandItemShadowing
rules.description: 启用/itemshadowing命令以制作物品分身
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandKillMe
rules.description: 启用/killMe命令用来自杀
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandLocations
rules.description: 启用/locations命令用来管理路径点
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayerTools
rules.description: 启用/playerTools命令用来提供一些假玩家相关的辅助工具
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandProtect
rules.description: 启用/protect命令用来控制受保护玩家列表
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandSendMessage
rules.description: 启用/sendMessage命令发送一些可复制消息或链接
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandSpectator
rules.description: 启用/spectator命令用来在生存模式和旁观模式间切换
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandXpTransfer
rules.description: 启用/xpTransfer命令用来在玩家间互相分享经验
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: creativeImmuneKill
rules.description: 创造模式的玩家不会被/kill命令杀死

rules.name: damageEnchantmentCompatible
rules.description: 允许伤害类附魔共存

rules.name: disableBatCanSpawn
rules.description: 阻止蝙蝠自然生成

rules.name: disableDamageImmunity
rules.description: 阻止游戏限制生物受到伤害的频率

rules.name: disableIronGolemAttackPlayer
rules.description: 所有铁傀儡都不会试图反击玩家

rules.name: disableKelpGrow
rules.description: 阻止海带自然生长

rules.name: disableMagmaCubeSpawnNetherWastes
rules.description: 岩浆怪不会在下界荒地生成

rules.name: disableOpenOrWaterDetection
rules.description: 玩家可以在封闭水域钓鱼并获得宝藏

rules.name: disablePiglinZombify
rules.description: 阻止猪灵位于下界以外的维度时被僵尸化

rules.name: disablePortalUpdate
rules.description: 下界传送门方块收到方块更新不会做出反应

rules.name: disableRespawnBlocksExplode
rules.description: 玩家在非主世界维度使用床或在非下界维度使用重生锚时不会爆炸

rules.name: disableSnowGolemMelts
rules.description: 雪傀儡可以在任何群系生存

rules.name: disableVillagerWitch
rules.description: 村民被闪电劈中时不会变成女巫

rules.name: disableWaterFreezes
rules.description: 在寒冷的生物群系中水不会结冰

rules.name: enderPearlSpawnEndermiteProbability
rules.description: 设置末影珍珠生成末影螨的概率值

rules.name: fakePlayerCraftKeepItem
rules.description: 假玩家合成物品时会在物品栏中保留至少一个合成材料，除非该物品的最大堆叠数为1

rules.name: fakePlayerHeal
rules.description: 假玩家每2秒回复1生命值

rules.name: fakePlayerProtect
rules.description: 阻止特定的假玩家被命令杀死

rules.name: fakePlayerSpawnNotRetainKnockback
rules.description: 假玩家生成时不会保留上一次的击退、着火时间，摔落距离

rules.name: farmlandPreventStepping
rules.description: 踩踏耕地不会导致耕地退化

rules.name: fireworkRocketUseCooldown
rules.description: 使用烟花火箭后有5个游戏刻的冷却时间

rules.name: flyingUseOnBlockFirework
rules.description: 烟花火箭只能用来飞行

rules.name: hayBlockCompleteOffsetFall
rules.description: 落在干草捆上时不会受到摔落伤害

rules.name: healthNotFullCanEat
rules.description: 血量没有完全恢复并且饱和度小于等于5时可以进食

rules.name: highPrecisionBow
rules.description: 弓射出的箭不会产生随机偏移

rules.name: iceBreakPlaceWater
rules.description: 破坏冰时不需要下方是阻止运动的方块就可以变成水

rules.name: itemNeverDespawn
rules.description: 物品实体会一直留着世界中

rules.name: knockbackStick
rules.description: 可以给木棍附魔击退

rules.name: maxBlockPlaceDistance
rules.description: 服务器不会拒绝在此交互范围内的操作

rules.name: maxBlockPlaceDistanceReferToEntity
rules.description: 玩家可以选中最大方块交互距离内的实体

rules.name: netherPortalHasCollisionBox
rules.description: 通过让下界传送门方块有碰撞箱来阻止玩家意外的进入传送门

rules.name: notDamageEnderPearl
rules.description: 使用末影珍珠时不会受到摔落伤害

rules.name: openCarpetPermissions
rules.description: 仅在单人游戏中有效，允许在无作弊的单人游戏中使用/carpet命令
validators: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: openGameRulePermissions
rules.description: 允许无权限玩家在使用/gamerule命令

rules.name: openSeedPermissions
rules.description: 允许无权限玩家在服务器使用/seed命令

rules.name: openShulkerBoxForcibly
rules.description: 允许玩家打开被阻挡的潜影盒

rules.name: openVillagerInventory
rules.description: 允许通过潜行右键打开村民背包

rules.name: peacefulCreeper
rules.description: 苦力怕不会与玩家敌对

rules.name: pickaxeMinedBedrock
rules.description: 镐可以更快速的采集基岩

rules.name: piglinFastBarter
rules.description: 猪灵完成以物易物只需要8个游戏刻

rules.name: portalSpawnZombifiedPiglinProbability
rules.description: 将下界传送门生成僵尸猪灵的概率设置为指定值/2000

rules.name: protectionEnchantmentCompatible
rules.description: 所有的保护类附魔可以共存

rules.name: regenerationSaturation
rules.description: 生命恢复会同时给予饱和效果

rules.name: renewableSwiftSneak
rules.description: 图书管理员可以交易迅捷潜行附魔书

rules.name: riptideIgnoreWeather
rules.description: 使用激流时忽略天气

rules.name: sculkShriekerCanSummon
rules.description: 让玩家放置的幽匿尖啸体默认可以生成监守者

rules.name: setBedrockHardness
rules.description: 将基岩的硬度设置为指定值

rules.name: simpleUpdateSkipper
rules.description: 通过让红石线不连接四周开启的活板门上的红石线来恢复1.20-pre2前的更新跳略器

rules.name: staringEndermanNotAngry
rules.description: 玩家可以盯着末影人眼睛看并且不会引起仇恨

rules.name: thornsDamageDurability
rules.description: 造成荆棘伤害后不会额外消耗耐久度

rules.name: turtleEggFastHatch
rules.description: 海龟蛋在白天也能快速孵化

rules.name: villagerHeal
rules.description: 村民每4秒回复1生命值

rules.name: villagerImmediatelyRestock
rules.description: 每次与村民交互都会先触发一次补货

rules.name: villagerInfiniteTrade
rules.description: 与村民交易时不会增加交易次数

rules.name: wideRangeBeacon
rules.description: 信标作用效果扩展50格,再向下延伸效果范围+384格

rules.name: witherSkeletonCanSpawnToPortal
rules.description: 凋零骷髅可以生成下界传送门方块或其他亮度不高于11的方块上
